prompts.title: Blog Post Outline Generator
prompts.content:
Create a detailed outline for a blog post about [TOPIC]. Include:
- Compelling headline (with 2 alternatives)
- Introduction hook
- 5-7 main sections with subpoints
- Key takeaways
- Call-to-action
Target audience: [AUDIENCE]
Tone: [TONE]

prompts.title: Story Plot Developer
prompts.content:
Develop a compelling plot for a [GENRE] story. Include:
- Main character with clear motivation
- Central conflict
- 3 major plot points
- Climax and resolution
- 2 subplot ideas
Setting: [TIME/PLACE]
Target length: [WORD COUNT]

prompts.title: Email Subject Line Optimizer
prompts.content:
Generate 10 email subject lines for [PURPOSE/TOPIC]. Optimize for:
- Open rates
- Clarity
- Urgency (if applicable)
- A/B testing variations
Include character count for each.
Target audience: [DEMOGRAPHIC]

prompts.title: Product Description Writer
prompts.content:
Write a compelling product description for [PRODUCT]. Include:
- Key features (bullet points)
- Benefits to the customer
- Emotional appeal
- Technical specifications
- SEO keywords: [KEYWORDS]
Tone: [professional/casual/luxury]
Word limit: [NUMBER]

prompts.title: LinkedIn Post Creator
prompts.content:
Create an engaging LinkedIn post about [TOPIC]. Structure:
- Attention-grabbing first line
- Personal story or insight
- 3 key lessons/tips
- Question to encourage comments
- Relevant hashtags (3-5)
Tone: Professional but personable
Length: 1300 characters max
